Html:
We have been using the TSF branching guidance (Main, Dev, Release) quite successfully for some time now.  Today the TFS admin decided to move all our TFS projects to a new server.  When I look at our projects on the new server all the branches and branch relationships are gone.  I'm not sure what he did to perform the copy but is there a way to get our relationships back?  I found something about performing a baseless merge and then re-parenting but the re-parent dialog was always empty.

Thanks for any help
